pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Comprehensive Collection of Cancer Types and Cancer-Related Datasets // Offers a rich collection of data focused on cancer research, covering survival rates, genetic studies, biomarkers, and epidemiological insights. Designed for researchers, analysts, and bioinformatics practitioners, the package includes datasets on various cancer types such as melanoma, leukemia, breast, ovarian, and lung cancer, among others. It aims to facilitate advanced research, analysis, and understanding of cancer epidemiology, genetics, and treatment outcomes.
